channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- avahi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- avahi

item.title: CVE-2023-38473|2023-11-02T15:00:19.576Z -- n%2Fa -- avahi
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Avahi. A reachable assertion exists in the avahi_alternative_host_name() function.

item.title: CVE-2023-38469|2023-11-02T14:49:26.283Z -- n%2Fa -- avahi
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Avahi, where a reachable assertion exists in avahi_dns_packet_append_record.

item.title: CVE-2023-38472|2023-11-02T14:59:24.996Z -- n%2Fa -- avahi
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Avahi. A reachable assertion exists in the avahi_rdata_parse() function.

item.title: CVE-2023-38471|2023-11-02T14:58:22.628Z -- n%2Fa -- avahi
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Avahi. A reachable assertion exists in the dbus_set_host_name function.

item.title: CVE-2023-38470|2023-11-02T14:57:28.872Z -- n%2Fa -- avahi
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Avahi. A reachable assertion exists in the avahi_escape_label() function.

item.title: CVE-2023-1981|2023-05-26T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- avahi
item.description: A vulnerability was found in the avahi library. This flaw allows an unprivileged user to make a dbus call, causing the avahi daemon to crash.
